titleInfo.title: Sing We Now Merrily - A Celebration of English Choral Music - DMus Choral Conducting Recital

mods.note: This audiovisual content is being provided solely for educational use and research, pursuant to exceptions in the Canadian Copyright Act. Further reproduction or distribution or other use may require additional permissions
mods.tableOfContents: O Clap Your Hands (with Tammy-Jo Mortensen, organ) / John Rutter -- Three Motets: I. Justorum animae; II. Coelos ascendit hodie; III. Beati quorum via / Charles Villiers Stanford -- Missa Brevis (with Tammy-Jo Mortensen, organ): I. Kyrie; II. Sanctus and Benedictus; III. Agnus Dei (Jessican Robertson, mezzo soprano; Jared Samborski, tenor); IV. Gloria (Kimberley Denis, soprano; Elizabeth Mazurok, soprano; Jessica Robertson, mezzo soprano; Megann Karasin, mezzo soprano; Abra Whitney, mezzo soprano; Bradley Cronin, tenor; Wayne Poon, tenor; Steven Miller, bass) / William Walton -- Hymn to St. Cecilia (Camilla Kershaw, soprano; Abra Whitney, mezzo soprano; Jared Samborski, tenor; Rob Curtis, bass) / Benjamin Britten -- Fair Phyllis / John Farmer -- Draw On, Sweet Night / John Wilbye -- Three Shakespeare Songs: I. Full Fathom Five; II. The Cloud-Capp'd Towers; III. Over Hill, Over Dale / Ralph Vaughan Williams -- Singing By Numbers (with Jared Samborski, piano) / I. Sing we now merrily; II. The singing of birds; III. Hey down a down!; IV. Cruet MacNightshade; V. Sing you now; VI. Everybody sang; VIII. Hey down a down/Sing with thy mouth / Bob Chilcott
